attributes.action: life skills for secondary and primary schools
attributes.background: To put life skills on primary and secondary national curriculum

rejection.details:
We are not sure exactly what skills you'd like to be covered. You could start a new petition setting out clearly what skills you'd like to be taught. 

You can read more about the national curriculum here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/national-curriculum

You may wish to sign this petition:

Legally require all secondary schools in England to teach financial education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701663
